title: Assistive Technology Integration Educational Material Development Project for Special Education Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational special education theories, basic understanding of assistive technology (AT), fundamental learning design principles
context.additional_context: Project-based learning where pre-service teachers design and implement assistive technology-based educational materials in a blended classroom environment reflecting real special education settings

learning_goals: Learners can design customized educational materials using assistive technology (AT) by analyzing the needs of special education students
Learners can identify barriers (e.g., lack of technical skills, infrastructure limitations) and propose solutions when applying assistive technology in actual classroom settings
Learners can develop effective educational materials by applying systematic instructional design processes such as the ADDIE model
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
